original_text: The Lord, the God of their ancestors, sent word to them through his messengers again and again, because he had pity on his people and on his dwelling place.
korean_text: 그 조상들의 하나님 여호와께서 그의 백성과 그 거하시는 곳을 아끼사 부지런히 그의 사신들을 그 백성에게 보내어 이르셨으나

sentences.original_text: The Lord, the God of their ancestors
sent word to them through his messengers
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 사자들을 통해 그들에게 말씀을 보내셨다

sentences.original_text: because he had pity on his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 백성을 불쌍히 여기셨기 때문이다
